features: 【Steamer & Iron 2 In 1】(Patented Design): You Can Choose Between Two Modes: Iron Mode Or Steamer Mode. In Iron Mode, You Can Use It As A Normal Iron Without Adding Water. In Steamer Mode, You Can Add Water To The Tank And Press The Button To Release Steam. It Also Does Not Damage Or Leave Marks On Your Clothes, Unlike Some Traditional Irons. Steam Ironing Is More Effective Than Dry Ironing, As It Penetrates Deeper Into The Fabric Fibers And Removes Wrinkles Faster.

【Travel Essentials For You】: The Handheld Steamer Features A Lightweight & Portable, Compact Design For Travel, The Handle Of The Steam Iron Is Rotatable For 0°-90°-180°, To Save Space When Travel. Suitable For Personal Travel, Family Travel, Business Trips, And College Dorms. When Using It In Other Countries Just With One Converter. You Can Use This Travel Steamer For Clothes Portable Mini To Keep Your Clothes Neat And Fresh Wherever You Go.

【1000W & 5s Fast Heating】: With 1000W High Power, The Steamer Can Iron Clothes With A Constant Temperature Of 302°F. It Only Takes 5 Seconds To Warm Up And 3 Minutes To Iron A Shirt, Which Will Make It Easy And Effortless For You To Iron Clothes, Curtains, Bed Sheets, And So On. A Triangular Tip Design That Allows For 360° Ironing, Making It Easy To Iron Narrow Areas Like Shirt Buttons, Plackets, And Blazer/dress Collars. This Steamer Is Truly A Home Essential And College Apartment Essential.

【Portable & Comfortable】: This Mini Garment Steamer Has A Foldable Handle That Makes It Easy To Store. It Can Iron Clothes Both Flat And Hanging. It Weighs Only 1.37 Pounds And Has A Maximum Length Of 6 Inches, So It Is Comfortable To Hold And Use. You Can Iron Clothes For A Long Time With This Steamer Without Feeling Tired Or Sore.

【Safe & Suitable For All Fabrics】: This Mini Iron Has A Smooth And Anti-scratch Ceramic Panel That Can Remove Creases And Wrinkles Effectively Without Harming The Fabric. It Is Safe And Suitable For All Kinds Of Fabrics, Such As Organic Fabrics, Nylon Blends, Wool, Cotton, Linen, And More.You Can Use This Fabric Steamer For Clothes To Make Your Garments Look Smooth And Crisp.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you looking for a versatile and convenient iron that can handle any fabric and any situation? If so, you will love the Steamer Iron For Clothes Travel Mini, the ultimate 2-in-1 iron and steamer that can make your clothes look flawless in minutes. Whether you need to iron a shirt for a meeting, steam a dress for a party, or freshen up a curtain for a guest, this steamer iron can do it all. It has a patented design that lets you switch between iron mode and steamer mode with ease. In iron mode, you can use it as a normal iron without adding water. In steamer mode, you can add water to the tank and press the button to release steam. It also does not damage or leave marks on your clothes, unlike some traditional irons. Steam ironing is more effective than dry ironing, as it penetrates deeper into the fabric fibers and removes wrinkles faster.

The Steamer Iron For Clothes Travel Mini is also the perfect travel companion for you. It features a lightweight and portable design that can fit in any suitcase or backpack. The handle of the steam iron is rotatable for 0°-90°-180°, to save space when traveling. You can use it in any country with just one converter. You can use this travel steamer for clothes portable mini to keep your clothes neat and fresh wherever you go.

The Steamer Iron For Clothes Travel Mini is also powerful and fast. It has a 1000W high power that can iron clothes with a constant temperature of 302°F. It only takes 5 seconds to warm up and 3 minutes to iron a shirt, which will save you time and energy. It has a triangular tip design that allows for 360° ironing, making it easy to iron narrow areas like shirt buttons, plackets, and blazer/dress collars. It has a smooth and anti-scratch ceramic panel that can remove creases and wrinkles effectively without harming the fabric. It is safe and suitable for all kinds of fabrics, such as organic fabrics, nylon blends, wool, cotton, linen, and more.

The Steamer Iron For Clothes Travel Mini is truly a home essential and college apartment essential. It can iron clothes both flat and hanging, giving you more flexibility and convenience. It weighs only 1.37 pounds and has a maximum length of 6 inches, so it is comfortable to hold and use. You can iron clothes for a long time with this steamer without feeling tired or sore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and efficient products
reviews.reviewText: The quality and performance of this mini travel hanging press is excellent. The powerful steam output ensures that my clothes are wrinkle-free and brand new. Compact size, easy to carry. I take it with me every time I go out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most convenient home gadget
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is just what I want! It looks very fashionable and it works very well. Wrinkles disappear in minutes. It has become one of my favorite household items!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The size and design of this product is perfect. It's easy to pack and only takes up a little room. I like that you can steam and iron with it. It heats up quickly and produces a good amount of steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It looks cute, but…
reviews.reviewText: This items is precious. The cutest iron you have ever seen. However, it worked once for me and then stopped. Unfortunately this meant I was out of the country for two weeks with very wrinkled clothes. I then had to bring the broken iron back with me (I wanted to toss so bad to save room in my luggage). It also smelt like melted rubber the one time it kind of worked. I may have gotten a bad product but it’s not worth the hassle of exchanging to find out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and powerful, good quality
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product! This hand-held portable hanging press is very effective and can quickly eliminate wrinkles on clothes, leaving clothes looking smooth and flat with texture. Very convenient for travel and daily use. It's a must-have for my business trip. It's worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Heats up really quickly and does a great job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something small that I could have at home and on the go when I travel. It's just as described and it's super cute too. Love the color. I like that it has a heater base to place the steamer on and a small cup to show the minimum and maximum amount of water allowed in the steamer. I also like that the body rotates, which can help when placing water in it or it can also help when ironing some clothes. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It heats up very quickly and does the job. Perfect for traveling.
